name: Slice & Dice Adventures
description:
"Slice & Dice Adventures" is a narrative-driven dungeon crawler, set in a fable world of the fierce warriors among smaller forest/meadow animals. Main character, Borvin the Ruthless, is a badger warlock who is out on his first quest to slay monsters and protect the Willow Shire.

This short game experience is made for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022.
